name: Verdant Evil
description:
Made for the Mashup Game Jam 2022

Randomly generated theme: Horror, Growth, Lab, Switch

Controls:
- AD or arrows to move
- W or up arrow to jump
- Mouse to aim and shoot
- E to interact with switches and objects
- Esc to reset

Tips:
- Stay alive as long as possible!
- Touching plants hurts!
- Doors block plant spread
- Press E to interact with highlighted objects
- Broken fuse boxes (with exposed wires) keep doors open and need to be repaired
- Reload by pressing E next to the ammo barrel
